quest.name: An Othardian Wolfman in Gridania
journal:
An investigator for the Adventurers' Guild appears to be more than a little concerned.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

It is a day like any other in Gridania, except that a wolfman from Doma has wandered into the city and expressed a desire to join the Continental Circus. Said circus is, of course, no place for any good-hearted individual─beastman or otherwise─and the investigator is desperate to save the Lupin from a life of devilry. For lack of a better plan, he begs you to join the Continental Circus along with the Doman traveler.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Soga, the Lupin come from distant Doma, is pleased to make your acquaintance and pleasantly surprised that you do not regard him with fear and uncertainty like so many others. He explains that he wishes to turn his uncommon appearance to his advantage by joining the troupe, where he believes he will be welcomed with open arms and be rich in “nakama” or some such. Yet all who wish to become a member of the Continental Circus must first receive the blessing of the Impresario...

The Impresario is delighted to receive you and Soga, stating that he is more than willing to permit you to join. First, however, you must complete a simple task. To wit, you must frighten several Gridanians for reasons the Impresario is quick to obfuscate. While Soga may use his gods-given gifts to accomplish this, you must rely on other means provided by the Continental Circus: a guise of the werewolf, which you may use to assume a rather more beastly form!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: Ah, it's you! The kind adventurer who helped us before! I do hope you'll forgive me for imposing upon you once more, but we have something of an unprecedented situation here...

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: You are an adventurer, yes, and an experienced one besides? Ah, Twelve be praised! We could do with the assistance of a womanman such as yourself...

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: You see, a wolfman claiming to have come from distant Doma wishes to join the Continental Circus!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: Now, don't get me wrong─it's a fine thing the troupe does, going around Eorzea's great cities and livening up the various All Saints' Wake festivities. But I would never encourage someone to throw their lot in with the fiends!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: And that's no exaggeration either. Mark me, friend: they're demons! Honest-to-gods monsters who delight in terrorizing decent folk like you and me!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: ...Though, to be fair, that mostly amounts to the occasional prank, like stealing your socks or spilling your drink when you're not looking. Still, there's no telling when they'll get a taste for blacker deeds!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: I told all this and more to the wolfman, of course, but he just looked at me like I'd been quaffing milkroot all morning. Aye, at this rate, I fear there's nothing we can do to save him from a life of devilry...

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: Wait, I've got an idea! It's a little convoluted, but...if you and our Far Eastern friend joined the Continental Circus together, you could keep him from committing any truly unspeakable evils!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: Yes, yes, that makes about as much sense as anything. By the by, the wolfman's name is Soga. He's quite sociable, so don't be hesitant to, say, wander over to the Whistling Miller and approach him without prompting.

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: You...you do not fear me, Eorzean?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I've had dealings with beastmen before.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Oh, I'm quaking in my boots.

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: Would that more of your kinsmen could say the same. Most here regard me with suspicion, if not outright fear.

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: Are you, now... Nevertheless, you have mustered the courage to speak with me, and for that I am grateful. Others make a concerted effort to pretend I am not here, as if my very presence is an affront to their Matron.

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: I have found myself with more freedom to travel since the liberation of my homeland, and so I thought to come to Eorzea. Such is the reason for my being here, but what is yours for seeking me out?

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: With the aid of my countrymen I came to Gridania by way of Revenant's Toll. Such is the reason for my being here, but what is yours for seeking me out?

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: You too wish to join the Continental Circus? Ho, what fortune! I thought perhaps you were an associate of that nosy adventurer who attempted to deter me from my course...

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: Wheresoever I go in these lands, I am feared. Men avert their gaze, women cross the road to avoid me, children burst into tears.

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: That, however, is my experience as a humble traveler. As a member of the Continental Circus, on the other hand, I would be lauded for this “talent,” would I not?

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: No longer would I be scorned and alone─nay, I would be rich in “nakama,” as the Hingans say. We too could be nakama!

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: Ah, but I am getting ahead of myself! I have yet to even ask you your name.

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: Forename, is it? It is an honor and a pleasure. Now, then─let us go and greet the Impresario!

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: It shouldn't be too hard to find Soga. Just stand around at a crossroads or some such and keep an eye out for, well...a wolfman!

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: Well, well, well. Two wanderers who wish to join our esteemed troupe of tricksters. Yet what is this strange sense of familiarity? Perchance naught more than a figment of my imagination, but...never mind.

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: Well, well, well. Two wanderers who wish to join our esteemed troupe of tricksters. I cannot help but wonder at your motives, but it matters not in the end─if you truly yearn to strike fear into the hearts of your fellow man, that is enough.

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: This year we will throw open the doors of our haunted manor once more, and as we have our hands full with the preparations, we would be fools to turn away you and your wolfman associate.

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: Then you will permit us to join the Continental Circus? Just like that? Kami be praised! I am grateful to you beyond measure, good sir, and should be glad to assist you in any way you desire!

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: My, such enthusiasm! Very well, let us begin with a simple task─a test of your skills, rather, in which you shall attempt to frighten several subjects, sowing seeds of terror into their─ahem─thereby showing them a jolly good time.

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: Afterwards, you may then encourage them to join in the fun as well, though... Hmm. That said, your comparatively plain disposition will not serve you well in this endeavor.

dialogue.name: IMPHEAD
dialogue.text: Fortunately, we have the means to bestow upon you rather simliar wolflike features! Take it, with our blessings!

dialogue.name: SOGA
dialogue.text: I wanted to let that adventurer know not to worry about me, so I gave a missive to one of those little postmen earlier. It twirled and said, “Thank you, kupo!”

dialogue.name: INVESTIGATOR03011
dialogue.text: Soga wrote me a letter saying that the two of you were off to meet the Impresario? I'll leave you to it, then.
